articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Migrant boat sinks off Turkish coast, 8 killed
articles.description: A rubber boat carrying an estimated 15 migrants has sank off Turkey's Aegean coast, and at least eight people who were on board have died
articles.content:
ANKARA, Turkey -- 
A boat carrying migrants sank off Turkey's Aegean coast, killing eight people, Turkey's Interior Ministry said Friday. A search-and-rescue mission continued for about seven migrants thought to be missing.
A ministry statement said a rubbe… [+1078 chars]

articles.title: 1 arrest after truck and dog are stolen; dog remains missing
articles.description: Police in South Carolina have made an arrest after a man's truck was stolen with his dog inside it, but the dog remains missing
articles.content:
NORTH CHARLESTON, S.C. -- 
Police in South Carolina have made an arrest after a man's truck was stolen with his dog inside it, but the dog remains missing.

articles.title: Police arrest 7 in New Year's Eve mob sexual assault
articles.description: A senior security official says police have arrested seven young men for allegedly taking part in a mob sexual assault of a young woman during New Year's Eve celebrations
articles.content:
CAIRO -- 
Police arrested seven young men for allegedly taking part in a mob sexual assault of a young woman during New Year's Eve celebrations, a senior security official said Friday.

articles.author: Mark Hanrahan
articles.title: Derailed train plunges into river, crew rescued by boat
articles.description: A cargo train derailed, sending the engine into an Idaho riven late Wednesday night, leaving the driver and crew to be rescued by boat and authorities working to contain.
articles.content:
A cargo train derailed, sending the engine into an Idaho river late Wednesday night, leaving the driver and crew to be rescued by boat and authorities working to contain diesel fuel leaking into the river.
The Burlington Northern Railroad train derailed into… [+1794 chars]

articles.title: Montenegro denounces protest attack on its embassy in Serbia
articles.description: Montenegro has strongly denounced aggression by thousands of ultra-nationalists during a protest outside the Montenegrin Embassy in Serbia
articles.content:

articles.title: Mental tests ordered for man accused of killing Iowa pastor
articles.description: A mental competency evaluation has been ordered for a man accused of beating to death a pastor outside a central Iowa church
articles.content:
FORT DODGE, Iowa --

BEIJING --
